column4: I was upset when xmms vanished from my system, so I tried to install xmms2, and there is no GUI that looks like winamp, which is why I liked xmms in the first place. :(  Is there a winamp-like app I can get?
are you looking for the skin?
did you try to use BMP with pulseaudio?
don't know... maybe.  been a few weeks since I uninstalled it.
